comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Celia Coleman was the maid who testified that she heard her employer Mrs. Edwin Carman confess to killing Lulu Bailey. Miss Coleman's intellectual capacity and memory were questioned on the stand--she was not able to add numbers or say how old she was, which was taken as reason to doubt her reliability as a witness on other matters.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for providing some details about Celia Coleman.  We will add some of them to the image description when we update.
